nodes.text: During the Mandalorian Wars, sometime before 3964 BBY, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders attacked the planet Quelii and inflicted heavy casualties on the civilian population. The Human male known as Alek Squinquargesimus, who was born on Quelii, managed to escape the battle, and eventually became a Jedi Knight.

This battle was first mentioned in the forty–second issue of the Knights of the Old Republic comic series, written by John Jackson Miller. It was created as part of the backstory for the Jedi Malak, formerly known as Alek Squinquargesimus. When asked by a user on the Dark Horse message boards, Miller confirmed that the battle was canon.
